message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll be happy with your purchase.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $180 is a bit steep for me.  I'm only willing to pay $120 for this product.  Let me know if that works for you.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $160. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $160 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $130.  Let's see if we can make this work.

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $130. I'm willing to compromise again and offer it to you for $145. It's still a great price, and I think you'll be happy with the value you're getting.

Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $145 is still more than I'm prepared to pay. I'm sticking with my offer of $130.  This is my final offer, let me know if it works for you.
